TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Mahamadou_Issoufou, title = Mahamadou_Issoufou, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mahamadou_Issoufou} }

S.FORM: I 1951 a miheca saka folad saka a romi'ad masofoc ci Mahamadou Issoufou , malamikomoday a tamdaw. O Sawara'an no kitakit no Niger anini i ci Mahamadou Issoufou, patirengan a romi'ad i 2011 a miheca saka 4 folad saka 7 a romi'ad.

I 1951 a miheca saka folad saka a romi'ad masofoc ci Mahamadoo Issoofoo , malamikomoday a tamdaw. O Sawara'an no kitakit no Niger anini i ci Mahamadoo Issoofoo, patirengan a romi'ad i 2011 a miheca saka 4 folad saka 7 a romi'ad.
